div.p:
In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of Abirdene be the aldirman and ballies the xvij day
of Decembre the yer' of god et cetera lxxxiiij James craik callit to entir Johne andirsone
forstallar' as the thrid dai / comperit nocht / quharfor alexander chamer seriand was commandit
to distres the said James et cetera and towarn him til entir the said Johne on the law dai
eftir yule as for the ferd and peremptour' day
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xviijuo die mensis Decembris predicti

quo die Alexander de camera prepositus prosecutus fuit per plegium Jacobum cvmyn de iniusta deten
cione xj marcarum ab eo / quj quidem Jacobus peciit diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio / et
ballivi assignauerunt eidem diem Juridicum post festum nativitatis domini nostri / plegio manu sua propria
et bonis pro introitu suo die predicto responsurus et Juri periturus

Willelmus goldsmyth in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione domini Johannis chavmer capellanj in verbo
et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum virorum / plegio legali pro dicto Willelmo de indempnitate
prefati domini Johannis / Johanne de Kintor

Thomas prat plegius pro Willelmo Dauidson calumpniatus pro foristallacione vocatus ad comparere
faciendum dictum Willelmum ad calumpniam prepositi non intrauit eundem quare precipitur seriando capere districtum et cetera

The xxiij dai of Decembre the yer' forsaid before the aldirman ballies and diuers' of the consel
of abirdene sittand in Jugement in the tolbuthe / comperit Donald gilfyllane and askit
fra thom of narne his Seil quhilk the said thom had sen the tyme of the seling of
a chartir made til him be the said Donald of the date of the xj dai of februar' the yer'
of god jM iiijC lxxxiij And the said thomas sayd in gude faith he had nocht his seil nor
wyst nocht quhare it was bot that it was analeit fra him his vnwitting / quharfor
the said Donald protestit solempnitly . that quhat lettres or euidentis fra that dai furth of
the making of the said chartir war selit with his said seil suld nocht tvrn him nor his
ayris til na preiudice in tym tocum / and has vtirly adnullit the said seil and has reuokit
al lettrez sen syne selit with the samyn gif ony be for evyr

The samyn dai the Aldirman and consale has grantit and gevin til Richart boyl for his
gude seruice made and tobe made in the qveyr of abirdene the erast burges or foristallar'
that sal pleis' Robert blindsel or Alexander rede tocheis'

The assise has deliuerit that William Ranald of Dys' son sal deliuer ane swerd til
William Wormot within terme of law the quhilk he folowit him of / et cetera
Willelmus de lammynton' et andreas lowson conuicti per assisam amerciantur pro perturbio adinuicem

Willelmus cadiou in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione mariote ramsay / et tenetur emendare
eedem ad visum proborum virorum / plegio legali pro eo magistro andrea cadiou de indempnitate dicte mariote

Item dicta mariota amerciatur quare perturbavit prefatum Willelmum verbo plegio legali pro ea alexandro chamour seriando ut supra
patricius chamer in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi cadiow et emendabit ut supra

The assise has deliuerit anent the ressate of certane quhete sald be Johne blak
of leith til Androw Wentoune that the said androw sal empleis' the merchand

Adam hervy conuict be the assise is amerciate for the wrangwis' halding of vnsufficent
folk in his hous' on tusday at evin / and for dissobeying of the officeris

Thomas prat borgh for Wil Dauidson chalansit for a forstallar' callit to entir the
said William / comperit nocht / quharfor the seriand was chargit to distres the said thomas
and towarn him til entir the said William on friday eftir the law dai eftir yule as to
the thrid day

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the penult dai of Decembre
the yer' of god et cetera lxxxiiij Wil bertram convict be ane assise was adiugit in amerciament
for the wranguis' strublance of hary martyne and til amend til him as law wil
the quhilk assise fand alsua that the said William was principal causar' of al the
strublance done to the said hary mertyn'

Thom of chamer law borgh for William bertram and his partie that hary martyn' and his
party salbe vnscathit vthirwais than be way of law / And that he sal comper' the
morn at ix houris before the consale tovndirly thare ordinance for his trespas

Item James lesly law borgh for hary martyn and his partie that Wilyam bertram
and his partie salbe vnscathit vthirwais than law wil

The vij dai of Januar' the yer' forsaid In presence of the aldirman and ballies of abirdene Sir
William of Knollis preceptor of torfichin knicht has constitute and ordanit Johne of Knollis
his brudir his procuratour and assignay in that part / toask and tak in his name and behalf fra Alexander
rede and Dauid menyes twa of the saidis ballies heritable state sesyne and possession of the land
of thomas symson and Jonet his spous' liand in the vuerkirkgate eftir the tenor of the act made
tharuppon of before / bot gif the said thomas within xxtj daies accord with the said knycht or his
procuratour apon the payment of xiij barellis of salmond restand vnpait to the said knicht / The
quhilk sesyne state and possession the ballies forsaid has takin apon thaim togif les than
the said thomas bring ane discharge to thame tharuppon fra the said knicht or his procuratour
within the xx dais as said is

Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem decimo die
mensis' Januarij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes
patent in rotulo sectis

Eodem die Jacobus cvmyn super quem Alexander de camera prepositus extendit plegium pro iniusta detencione
vndecim marcarum primo die vocatus ad respondendum dicto plegio non comparuit Ideo precipitur philippo
Dunbrek et moricio besat seriandis capere districtum et cetera et premunire eundem Jacobum ad proximam
curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem huius processus / testibus thoma iameson et Johanne
thomson de summonicione dicti Jacobi ad cameram sue habitacionis per dictos seriandos ad proximam
curiam legalem

Decretum fuit per curiam et datum pro Judicio per os Willelmi modan Judicatorum curie quod Da
uid galichtly est in amerciamento curie quia deficit in probacione solucionis summe xxxix soli
dorum clamat' per Walterum achneve tanquam in termino sibi assignato / et quod idem Dauid
tenetur satisfacere dicto Waltero de dicta summa vsualis monete infra terminum Juris
Walterus achneve fatetur se plenarie solut' per David galichtlie de dicta summa xxxix solidorum

the ballies has assignit til Richart listar this dai xv dais to preve that he offerit pai
ment til thomas prat of vj li' of blak monee the tym that the said money had curs'
and passage And the assise has delayit the lave of the said thomas clame quhil that
be prefit

James of Kintor before the aldirman and ballies in Jugement comperit and sayd that this dai
was assignit til him and his party contrare maistir Androw cadiow for the decision' of the tak
of half a net of the raik quhilk the said James has of quhilum cristian of cadiow
And protestit that the absence of the said maistir Androw or delay of the said matir tvrn
him til na preiudice of his said tak in tyme tocum

the production of the preif be Dauid theman anent vij crovnis scottis persewit be him
apon patrik murray and his borgh maistir Androw cadiou / is continuit with consent of the said
Dauid / and of ser Dauid vaus comperand in the name of the said mastir Androw til the
next lachful court apon a xv dais next eftir the hame cuming of the said maistre
Androw fra Edinburgh but preiudice of ony party

Dominus Dauid vaus capellanus et procurator altaris beate marie magdalene protestatus fuit pro
quodam annuo redditu quinque solidorum eidem altari debit' annuatim de quadam terra Jacente
in ly grene inter terram eiusdem domini Dauid ex boreali parte / et terram quondam patricij coupar ex
parte australi / ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
presentauit in curia tanquam tercia die huius processus / testibus gilberto garuiach Johanne thomason
et philippo de Dunbrek seriendo

Perlectis tribus processibus ductis per dominum Willelmum crukschank capellanum et procuratorem
altaris beati Duthaci in ecclesia parrochiali beati nicholai huius burgi / Decretum fuit per curiam
et datum pro Judicio per os Willelmi modan Judicatorum curie / quod dictus dominus Willelmus procuratorio
nomine eiusdem altaris / adeptus est possessionem et proprietatem vnius terre vaste Jacentis
in vico nauium inter terram Johannis more ex orientali parte et terram magnj Wormot
ex occidentali parte / ob defectum solucionis cuiusdam annuj redditus duodecim solidorum
et sex denariorum eidem altari de dicta terra debit' annuatim et a longo
tempore non solut'

Andreas branche protestatus fuit quod prosecucio processuum per dominum Dauid vaus super
predicta terra in li grene non cedat sibi in preiudicio quo ad feodum suum et hereditatem eiusdem
cum ipse paratus sit eidem domino Dauid facere quicquid de Jure aut racione tenetur

Eodem die accedens ad barram frater Johannes ratree prior domus fratrum car
melitarum huius burgi peciit tres processus per eum ductos perlegi / quibus perlec
tis et hora diei legittima expectata et ceteris peractis que ordo Juris exigit
et requirit decretum fuit per curiam et datum pro Judicio per os Willelmi modane
Judicatoris curie / quod dictus prior procuratorio nomine domus et conuentus predicti recuperavit
possessionem et proprietatem cuiusdam terre vaste Jacentis in vico inferiori ecclesie beati
nicholai ex boriali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis malisson ex occidentali parte / et
terram alexandri alanson ex parte orientali in defectu solucionis cuiusdam annuj red
ditus sex solidorum et octo denariorum de dicta terra eisdem domuj et conuentui
debit' et a longo tempore non solut'

Item modo et forma predictis perlectis tribus processibus dictis per eundem priorem fratrum
carmelitarum datum fuit pro Judicio per os dicti Judicatoris quod dictus frater Johannes prior
adeptus est possessionem et proprietatem cuiusdam terre vaste Jacentis in li grene ex parte
boriali vici eiusdem citra pontem inter terram Johannis hil ex occidentali parte et terram thome
quhite ex orientali parte ob defectum solucionis vnius annuj redditus viginti denario
rum dictis priori et fratribus domus predicte de dicta terra debit' annuatim et
a longo tempore non solut' teste curia et cetera

The xiij dai of Januar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxxiiij / the Aldirman consale and communite of abirdene
for the obseruing and keping of thare actis made of before / and for the concord betuix ser
Androw gray and ser Waltir young chaplanis anens the debate movit apon the altara
ge of Sanct michale / and for the emplesir' of my lord of erol and fulfilling of his
request / with the consent of the said ser Androw gray / thai ordane and grauntis that the said
ser Waltir salhaf four' merkis of the altar' of Sanct michel yerlie in pensioune ay and
quhil he be promovit til ane chaplanry or seruice of ten merkis or aboue / and salbe
maid sickir thar'of in the best and maist autentik fourme that can be deuisit And gif
ser Androw gray makis the said ser Waltir sickir of the seruice of sex merkis quhilk he
has at Sanct ninianis altar' or of ony vthir sex merkis for seruice tobe done be the
said ser Waltir / the said ser androw salbe relevit and free of the said yerlie pension' of
four' merkis And atour' the said ser Waltir salhaf of the toune the keping of the
ferdyne and twa merkis yerlie tharfor . and als' of the common' gude of the toune
yerly vthir twa merkis / and salhaf the common seil gevin til him tharuppon for sickernes quhil
he be promovit til ane seruice or chaplanry of ten merkis as said is And salhaf
the common seil of the erast and first chaplanery that salhappin tovaik at the
presentacion or gift of the toune of ten merkis or aboue And for this the said ser Walter
is oblist toremain and mak seruice in the qvere daily at matynis hiemess' and
evinsang / and sal nocht absent him tharfra withoute ane lachful or sufficent excusacion that
salbe sene resonabil to the aldirman and consale of the toun And gif he at ony tym
wilfully absentis him fra his seruice as said is withoute licence of the ton' and resonabil
excusacion that be notourly knawin be the toune / than the said pensionis sal vaik
and be at the disposicion of the giffaris . And the aldirman consale and communite forsaidis has
ordanit and assignit the twa merkis yerlie for the keping of the ferding tobe pait to
the said ser Waltir be the handis of the maistir of thare kirk wark being for the tym
And the tuthir twa merkis tobe rasit yerlie of thare malis of Rubbislaw
at twa vsuale termes of the yer' Witsunday and mertymes in wyntir be evinly
porcionis et cetera

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be the ballies the xiiij dai of Januar' the yer'
of god et cetera lxxxiiij The assise fand and deliuerit that Johne Wormot has rycht til j quartar of a
half net of the Raik tane be William moyses fra gilbert vaus for the termes of the asse
dacion made til William moyses be gilbert vaus durand the termes of thre yeris tocum
and eftir the tenour of the samyn assedacion

Thom gledstan in amerciament for the wranguis' borgh strekin on Richart litstar of j merk for j
barel of ass' / and the said richart quyte of his clame / except that the assise fand that
the said richartis wif aw thom gledstan iij s' for the rest of j bol of meyl

the assise has ordanit edmond the hay topay mawnis Wormot his hail fracht
eftir the tenour of the actis made of before tharuppon'

The xviij dai of the said moneth of Januar' before androw branche ane of the bal
lies Dauid robertson in Dere has constitute Robert prat his procuratour to persew
and recovir his swerd being in the handis of Wil of benyn promittand tohald ferm
and stabil et cetera

The xix dai of Januar' in the court haldin be Androw branche ane of the bal
lies of abirdene in the tolbuthe / Wil of lyntoune convict be ane assise is adiu
git in amerciament for the wranguis' poynding and halding of a barel of salmond of
Johne Wormotis and to restore the said barel til him as law wil

The xx dai of Januar' before the ballies in Jugement Androw symson clamyt / androw
andirson of xiiij s' g' quhilkis he has pait as souerty for him for half a barel of
salmond / the quhilkis xiiij s' g' the said androw andirson has grantit topay til him within
terme of law gif his fadir wil nocht mak payment tharof within the said terme

Rob scheresmyth in amerciament for the wrangwis' halding of Johne of lyddalis swerd
and is adiugit torestore the samyn within lachful tyme

Sande prat convict in amerciament for the stricking of Wil of lammynton And the said
Wil for strublance of sande prat in word
Item sande prat and Johne of lammynton' ilkane in amerciament for strublance of vthir in word

malcum of lesly convict / be the assise is adiugit in amerciament for the wranguis'
strublance of Dauid marris seruand and til amend as law wil

the assise has ordanit Wil of benyn tocontent and pay Rob huntar of his mail
xvj s' within terme of law and he is in amerciament for the wranguis' halding tharof

the samyn dai William of Kintor becom law borgh for Dauid marr' and his seruandis
that Alexander of marr' and his seruandis salbe vndistrublit vthirwais than be way of law

Item Johne of marr' and Sande prat law borowis for malcum lesly / and the said Johne
law borch for Ranald quhitehede / androw gardnar and Wil harpar / that Dauid marr' and his
seruandis salbe vnscathit and vnharmit of thaim vthirwais than law wil

Alexander of marr' has fundin gilbert the vaus law borgh for him and his servandis that Da
uid marr' and his seruandis salbe vndistrublit vthirwais than be way of law et cetera

The samen day Alexander of chavmer aldirman Robert blindsel Johne of Knollis John'
colison' gilbert the vaus Johne Wormot thom prat adam of crafurd and androw
murray eldar auditouris of Dauid menyes compt of the kirkwark has sene
and considirit the samyn acompt / and has ordanit that the said Dauid menyes sal
bruke the wattirbol to the first day of marche next tocum / and fyve pundis
of siluer tobe allowit til him in his mail of the Justice myln'

The xxij dai of Januar' yer' of god et cetera lxxxiiij It is ordanit be the aldirman and consale that
Robert bughan sal in tym tocum for the worschip of the toune and honeste of merchandis quhen and
als' oft as he passis in flandris within four' daies eftir his cuming thare mak til him self ane
new gowne and doublat accordand for him vndir the pain of j li' g' tobe rasit of him to Sanct
Nicholace wark / and quhare ony four' of his nychbouris rydis in a cart / that he be fundin
passand in the cart rychtsua vndir the said pain / And for the xxx g' pait be mastir Adam
of gordon' parson of Kinkel for the hiring of a cart / thai haf ordanit the said Robert topay
ten s' scottis assignit be the said mastir Adam to the organis

the samen dai in presence of the aldirman and ballies maistir Richard of crafurd was oblist to
bring sufficent quittance of Wille rede of ellis suffisant document that he has payt to
Wille rede xij s' g' / betuix this and lammes / and that done / he salbe dischargit of the
some And gif he falyeis in the production of the quittance or document as said is he sal pay
the said some' of xij s' g' to Androw rede of badfothellis

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxiiijto die
Januarij anno Dominj supradicto /

quo die Jacobus cvmyn secundo die vocatus ad sectam Alexandri de camera
prepositi pro xj marcis non comparuit Ideo precipitur moricio besat seriendo capere districtum et cetera et summonire eundem
Jacobum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem processus / testibus andrea murra seniore et roberto prat
de summe dicti Jacobi ad tercium diem et cetera

Inquisicio Robertus blindsel Johannes de culan thomas prat Ricardus hil Willelmus hay
Willelmus malisson Dauid prat gilbertus leche Johannes grig Willelmus necolson Johannes
chepman Johannes catnes et Johannes talyour Qui jurati dicunt quod quondam Alexander stokar' frater
Agnetis stokar' latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri
Regis de quadam terra sine tenemento cum pertinencijs Jacente infra burgum de Abirdene in vico superiori ecclesie
ex parte boreali eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis catnes ex orientali parte et terram quondam Ade litstar
ex occidentali parte / Et de quadam terra templaria cum pertinencijs Jacente in li grene iuxta li Denburne
ex parte orientali et columbare li doucat ex parte occidentali Ac de quodam crofto cum pertinencijs Jacente
vltra li crabstane ex boreali parte vie regie inter croftum quondam Ricardi Kintor ex orientali
parte et croftum Willelmi Kintor ex australi parte Et quod dicta Agnes est legittima et propinquior
heres eiusdem quondam Alexandri fratris suj de dictis terris et crofto cum pertinencijs / et est legittime etatis
Et quod dictum tenementum cum pertinencijs in vico superiori ecclesie valet nunc per annum quatuor marcas
Reddendo inde annuatim xxviij s' annuj redditus ecclesie / et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod dicta
terra templaria in li grene cum pertinencijs valet nunc per annum xxiiij s' Reddendo inde annuatim
xxj s' viij d' annuj redditus et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod dictum croftum cum pertinencijs valet
nunc per annum viij s' Reddendo inde tantam summam annuj redditus annuatim et tantum valuit tempore
pacis Et quod dicta terra in vico superiori ecclesie et croftum predictum tenentur in capite de domino nostro
Rege per seruicium burgale / Et terra templaria in li grene tenetur de domo Sancti Johannis
Jerosolomitam per seruicium annuj redditus debit' et consuet' Et quod dicta terra in vico superiori ecclesie nunc
existit in manibus Mariorie sponse quondam dicti Alexandri stokar racione sue coniuncte infeo
datis pro tempore vite sue Et dicta terra templaria est in manibus perceptoris dicte domus de
torfichin Et quod dictum croftum nunc existit in manibus domini nostri Regis legitime per se ipsos
causa mortis et a tempore obitus dicti quondam Alexandri stokar' per spacium vnius annj et dimidii vel eo
circa in defectu veri heredis Jus suum nunc prosequentis

Eodem die Jacobus cvmyn primo die vocatus ad respondendum plegio super eum porrecto per Adam
andirson pro iniusta detencione precij quinque bollarum ordij ab eo ad bonum compotum prout ipse
fuit mercator ipsius ade / non comparuit quare precipitur Duncano stralogh seriendo quod capiat districtum et cetera

Thomas de fife vocatus primo die ad sectam Willelmi moyses pro iniusta detencione tercium librarum
monete scocie non comparuit Ideo precipitur dicto seriendo quod capto districto ab eodem thoma ipsum summoneat
ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem huius processus

the samyn dai Richart litstar was adiugit be the decrete of the court til content and pay
til thom prat sex pundis within terme of law / because he falyeit in his preif tharof
And the said richard be his hand has drawin his land and gude souerty to alexander
rede and androw branche twa of the ballies for payment of the said some'

fyndlaw fores conuict be the assise in amerciament for the distrublance of the officer' in word
and ath' til amend as law wil

the wif of Adam hervy in amerciament be hir awne graunt for breking of common' ordi
nance of candil makin

the samyn dai comperit in Jugement gilbert leche and offerit him tovndirly the law before
his Jugis ordinar' aldirman and ballies of this burgh in ony action that patrik smyth had to
persew againis him

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the xxvij dai of Januar' the yer'
of god et cetera lxxxiiij Thom Jardyne conuict be ane assise was adiugit in amerciament for the
wranguis' cuming on Johne sincler' vndir nycht and breking of his wyndo / and toamend as
law wil And the counsale has ordanit / that gif evir thai fynd sic trespas with the
said thomas in tym tocum he salbe bannyst

the samen dai Walter the flemyn is fundin awand to Cornelis ix lewis be the depo
sicion of certane persons tharto sworn et cetera

It is to remembre that the xix dai of this present moneth of Januar' / philp of Dunbrek
seriand present in the merket tosel certane gudis of Johne fichetis quhilkis war tane
in distres for payment of vij crovnis and vj s' acht til thom symson quhilkis
gudis war prisit that dai as the ferd dai to iiij li' and vj d' be gilbert morison
Sym of gardin robert of buchan John' grig David spens and richert litstar thareto
sworn in presence of alexander rede and androw branche twa of the ballies And thir ar the gudis
a cvuering prisit for xxvj s' / j feddir bed / a boustir and ij coddis price xxj s' a par' of schetis
viij s' / j mantil the price iiij s' / twa quartis and j pynt xiiij s' / j pan and a chandlar price
vij s' vj d'

the xxviiij dai of Januare Johne Watson' was chargit be the aldirman and ballies tocomper' this
dai xv dais to the instance of thomas prat til ansuer' and vndirly the law et cetera
